title: Scene Shortcuts
description:
Scene Shortcuts
Effortlessly jump between scenes with clickable map icons.

Scene Shortcuts is a lightweight and intuitive Foundry VTT module that allows you to place interactive icons directly on a scene's map. These icons act as shortcuts, letting players and GMs instantly transition to another scene with a single click.

Perfect for multi-room dungeons, world maps, or any setting where fast scene navigation enhances immersion and gameplay flow.

Features:

Add custom icons to any scene as teleport shortcuts.

Easily link icons to target scenes through a simple configuration menu.

Supports GM-only or player-visible shortcut options.

Fully customizable icon appearance and positioning.

Make your worlds feel more connected and alive—navigate your campaigns faster with Scene Shortcuts.
